title: Abrasive plate

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for an abrasive plate, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front perspective view of an abrasive plate of the present invention.
FIG. 2 is a first side view of the abrasive plate of FIG. 1 which is the same with each 180° rotation;
FIG. 3 is a second side view of the abrasive plate of FIG. 1 which is the same with each 180° rotation; and,
FIG. 4 is a back view of the embodiment of FIG. 1.
The broken lines in the drawings represent environmental structure only and form no part of the claimed design.
